mapper.sql: a.mem_que_id AS "memQueId", a.memberid AS "memberid", a.questionnaireid AS "questionnaireid", a.subjectid AS "subjectid", a.optionid AS "optionid", a.content AS "content", a.createtime AS "createtime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wy_member_ref_questionnaire( memberid, questionnaireid, subjectid, optionid, content, createtime ) VALUES ( #{memberid}, #{questionnaireid}, #{subjectid}, #{optionid}, #{content}, #{createtime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wy_member_ref_questionnaire SET mem_que_id = #{memQueId}, memberid = #{memberid}, questionnaireid = #{questionnaireid}, subjectid = #{subjectid}, optionid = #{optionid}, content = #{content}, createtime = #{createtime} WHERE id = #{id}
